snippet.title: Keep your joints healthy: A complete guide to staying strong
snippet.description:

http://www.cnn.com/2007/HEALTH/02/27/CL.joint.health/index.html

snippet.title: Gaga's injury related to 'being active'
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Cancer couldn't stop him from his marathon goal
snippet.description:
* For a serious distance runner, 7 hours, 48 minutes is not a great marathon time. But cut Brian Fugere some slack.

snippet.title: Lady Gaga suffers 'show injury,' postpones tour for a week
snippet.description:
* Lady Gaga suffers from a painful injury that has left her unable to walk, forcing the postponement of several shows, the singer said Tuesday.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/02/12/showbiz/lady-gaga-hurt/index.html

snippet.title: Actor Robert Urich dead at 55
snippet.description:
* Robert Urich, the versatile television actor who starred in at least 15 shows over his 30-year career, died Tuesday of cancer. He was 55.
http://www.cnn.com/2002/SHOWBIZ/TV/04/16/obit.urich/index.html
